instruction: Produce a summary of the following story.
input: The story is about an old man who lives with his grandchildren. One day the old man gets a letter informing him that his children, who left years ago in search of a better life, were now living in a big city. The old man decides to travel to the city to find his children.
output: An old man receives a letter informing him that his long lost children are living in a big city. He sets off on a journey to reunite with his family after years apart.
